Monitor Identity, Edge, and Data security posture.

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where ResultType == '50126'
| summarize FailedLogins = count() by UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| render timechart
content.title: Smart Lockout Trends (Wrong Passwords)

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == 'AzureFirewallApplicationRule'
| where msg_s has 'Deny'
| summarize BlockedConnections = count() by Target = extract('to ([0-9.]+:[0-9]+)', 1, msg_s)
| top 10 by BlockedConnections
content.title: Top Blocked Firewall Destinations

content.query:
SecurityScore
| summarize CurrentScore = max(CurrentScore) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| render timechart
content.title: Secure Score History
